argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` K ) = ( 1st ` K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 2nd ` K ) = ( 2nd ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran ( 1st ` K ) = ran ( 1st ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` ( 1st ` K ) ) = ( GId ` ( 1st ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_drngoi | |- ( K e. DivRingOps -> ( K e. RingOps /\ ( ( 2nd ` K ) |` ( ( ran ( 1st ` K ) \ { ( GId ` ( 1st ` K ) ) } ) X. ( ran ( 1st ` K ) \ { ( GId ` ( 1st ` K ) ) } ) ) ) e. GrpOp ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( K e. DivRingOps -> K e. RingOps ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_anim1i | |- ( ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) -> ( K e. RingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-fld | |- Fld = ( DivRingOps i^i Com2 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_elin2 | |- ( K e. Fld <-> ( K e. DivRingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_iscrngo | |- ( K e. CRingOps <-> ( K e. RingOps /\ K e. Com2 ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( K e. Fld -> K e. CRingOps ) |
